name: Mind Bending Racing Task Force
description:
Mind Bending Racing Task Force is an exciting infinite runner made over 3 days in a student game jam.  This title was our theme for what our game should be like.

Play as an invading Kaiju on the run from the task force that follows. Try and reach a highscore while experiencing weird 'Mind Bending' things happen to you while you play, avoid taking damage by jumping and dodging around obstacles in your path.

Controls - Left and Right Arrow keys or 'A' and 'D' to move side to side and spacebar to jump
